summary: This mod changes the hair, face and armor of Lydia, the housecarl of whiterun
descriptionHtml:
There are a lot of people who like Lydia, marry her and so on... but in my opinion she is not a follower for life. Now she has a new look (hairs, lips etc.), she fights with an skyforge steel sword, an nord hero bow and nord hero arrows, and she wears the iron plate armor. She\\\'s a little bit stronger and she can\'t die.

please comment.
And: if you think it\'s a good mod then ENDORSE IT.
author: gottofschrott
